sentences.eng: “My doll is more beautiful than yours.
– But my doll is taller than yours!”
sentences.rus: – Зато моя [кукла|кукла|a doll] выше, чем твоя».

sentences.eng: “My jeans are more fashionable than yours!
– But my T-shirt is more stylish than yours!”
Then they began to compare their bridegrooms:
“My bridegroom is more clever than yours!
Now they constantly compare their grandchildren:
sentences.rus: Теперь они [постоянно|постоянно, всё время|constantly] сравнивают своих [внуков|внуки|grandchildren]:

sentences.eng: “My grandchildren are more polite than yours!
– But mine are more independent than yours!”
sentences.rus: – Зато мои [внуки|внуки|grandchildren] более [самостоятельные|самостоятельный(ая), независимый(ая)|independent], чем твои!»

sentences.eng: It’s good that they always have something to compare!
sentences.rus: Хорошо, что им [всегда|всегда|always] есть что сравнить!
